name: Kirby's Pinball Land™
description: Original Release Date: November 1993 Choose your world and take aim! Kirby™ will be launched into the fast-paced dangers of uncharted worlds, but you can help him face his foes head on. It's a pinball race to check out each new world's surprise enemies and pitfalls. Flip Kirby in battles against lethal eyeballs, a shooting tree and mace-swinging maniacs. Take aim and leap to new worlds. Three different pinball games, four screens tall, with tons of secret bonus levels!
